62:1: yu-sab-bi-hu  li-laa-hi  maa  fis  sa-maa-waa-ti  wa-maa  fil  ar-dil   ma-li-kil  qud-doo-sil  azee-zil   hakeem
62:2: hu-wal  lazee    baa-sa   fil  um-miyyee-na  ra-soo-lam  mi-nhum  yat-loo  a-lai-him  aayaa-tihee  wayu-zak-kee-him  wayu-a-lli-mu-hu-mul  ki-taa-ba  wa-lhik-ma-ta  wain   kaa-noo  min  qab-lu  lafee  da-laa-lim  mubeen
62:3: waaa-kha-ree-na  mi-nhum  lam-maa  ya-lha-qoo  bi-him  wa-hu-wal  azee-zul   hakeem
62:4: zaa-li-ka  fad-lul  laa-hi   yu-tee-hi  ma-ny  ya-shaaa  wal-laa-hu  zul  fad-lil   azeem
62:5: ma-sa-lul  lazee-na   hum-mi-lut  taw-raa-ta  sum-ma  lam  yah-mi-loo-haa  ka-ma-sa-lil  hi-maa-ri  yah-mi-lu  as-faa-raa  bi-sa  ma-sa-lul  qaw-mil   lazee-na   kaaz-za-boo  bi-a-ayaa-til  laah     wal-laa-hu  laa  yah-dil  qaw-maz   zaa-limeen
62:6: qul  yaaaayyu-hal  lazee-na   haa-doo  in  zaam-tum  an-na-kum  aw-liyaaau  li-laa-hi  min  doo-nin  naa-si   fa-ta-man-na-wul  maw-ta    in  kun-tum  saa-diqeen
62:7: wa-laa  ya-ta-man-naw-na-hooo  a-ba-dam  bi-maa  qad-da-mat  ay-dee-him  wal-laa-hu  alee-mum  biz-zaa-limeen
62:8: qul  in-nal  maw-tal   lazee    ta-fir-roo-na  mi-nhu  fain-na-hoo  mu-laa-qee-kum  sum-ma  tu-rad-doo-na  i-laa  aa-li-mil  ghai-bi    was-hsha-haa-da-ti  fayu-nab-biu-kum  bi-maa  kun-tum  ta-ma-loon
62:9: yaaaayyu-hal  lazee-na   aa-ma-noo  i-zaa  noo-diya  lis-sa-laa-ti  mi-ny  yaw-mil  ju-mu-a-ti   fa-saw    i-laa  zik-ril  laa-hi   wa-za-rul  bai       zaa-li-kum  khay-rul  la-kum  in  kun-tum  ta-la-moon
62:10: fai-zaa  qu-diya-tis  sa-laa-tu  fan-ta-shi-roo  fil  ar-di    wab-ta-ghoo  min  fad-lil  laa-hi   waz-ku-rul   laa-ha   kasee-ral  laal-la-kum  tuf-li-hoon
62:11: wai-zaa  raaw   ti-jaa-ra-tan  aw  lah-wa-nin  fad-dooo  i-lai-haa  wa-ta-ra-koo-ka  qaaai-maa   qul  maa  in-dal  laa-hi   khai-rum  mi-nal  lah-wi    wa-mi-nat  ti-jaa-rah   wal-laa-hu  khay-rur  raa-ziqeen
